attributes.action: create a system where people who need hospital care after excessive drinking  ie binge drinking are charged for there treatment, as in the case of car drivers and passengers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of people have to attend hospital after totally irresponsible binge drinking or drink fuelled fighting.
It seems very unfair that these people,who are basically suffering from their own self inflicted injuries and often abusing our hospital staff in the process, should use up our hospital resources and time without being charged for it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
